By default, this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], specifying that this pipeline rasterizes primitives. # isRasterizationEnabled

**Instance Property**

Determines whether the pipeline rasterizes primitives.

## Declaration

```swift
var isRasterizationEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], specifying that this pipeline rasterizes primitives. Set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] when you don’t provide a fragment shader function via function [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4RenderPipelineDescriptor/fragmentFunctionDescriptor].
title: isRasterizationEnabled
